entry.title: New release for Wapy.dev: v1.1.0
entry.content:
New Features:

  • Added Paddle.com integration on the account page for seamless payment processing. This will not affect self hosted.
  • Refund Policy, Terms of Service, and Privacy Policy pages are now available. The footer menu has been updated to include these pages.
  • Pricing Page: A new Pricing page has been added for better plan visibility.

Enhancements:

  • Subscription & Sign-in Templates Updated (#6)
  • Add to Home Screen Prompt: The required number of visits has been reduced to 5 (previously 10).
  • Tailwind v4 & shadcn Updates (#39)
  • Moved edit pages under /edit route. (#42)
  • Docker Ignore File Added

Fixes üõ†Ô∏è - Sign-in Email Handling: Wrapped in a try/catch block to handle errors. - Email & Push notification title fixed for payment due. (#38) - Multiline notes issue resolved. Notes now display correctly. (#40) - 404 Page Fixes: Button/link issues resolved. (#41) - Minor UI Improvements: Adjustments to quotes, spacing, and text formatting. - Package updates.

entry.title: New release for Wapy.dev: v1.2.0
entry.content:
Enhancements: - Reports page is redesigned. (#50) - Filter menu is converted to modal window and currency filter is added. It's more organized now (#47) - Export functionality is added. (#17) - Menus are reorganized.

Fixes: - Router refresh is added when OTP URL is verified. (#45) - Theme+background colors in meta tags and icons in manifest are fixed. (#46) - Package updates.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/meceware/wapy.dev/compare/v1.1.0...v1.2.0
